title: T205's Lot of 50 All Different - SOLD
author: Archive

posts.post_title: T205's Lot of 50 All Different - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mike Brailey

Nice presentable group of 50 T205's with no cards exhibiting paper loss, writing or evidence of trimming.  Only a few of the cards do not have a crease or 2.  $850 or best offer for the entire lot postage included.



E-mail me at mikebrailey@yahoo.com if interested.



I will only break down the lot if after a few days no one buys the entire lot.



Here are the players and backs:
